titleStmt.title: The humble petition and resolution of the deputy-lieutenants, captains, officers, souldiers, and voluntiers of the trained bands of the county of Warwick to the right honourable, Robert Lord Brook, Lord Lieutenant of the county aforesaid, and by his Lordship presented to the high court of Parliament, July 9. 1642. With the answer of the Lords thereunto annexed.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: July 11. London, Printed for Joseph Hunscott, and John Wright,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print dated and signed: die Sabbathi, 9 Julii, 1642. Joh. Brown, cler. parl.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
